scripts.pre-export: rm -rf docs && mv next.config.js next.config-dev.js && mv next.config-export.js next.config.js && yarn build
scripts.post-export: mv next.config.js next.config-export.js && mv next.config-dev.js next.config.js && mv out docs && touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.export: yarn pre-export && next export && yarn post-export
